properties.description: this pipeline executes a procedure in sql server.

transformations.name: derivedColumn1
transformations.description: Creating/updating the columns 'Name, ProductNumber, SellStartDate, UnitPrice'

scriptLines: select1 derive(Description = case(UnitPrice > 500,'Unitprice is greater than 500','Unitprice is less than or equal to 500')) ~> derivedColumn1
